themes: lack of support for legacy/established artists
need for policy input from legacy artists
key_phrases: Create a working group or task force made up of long time 'legacy' artists
too much emphasis on 'emerging' or artists who are new to Austin
never been a 'legacy or established' arts category
isolating applicants from those who decides who get money
online only process that favors bureaucratic expediency
barriers_identified: lack of a 'legacy or established' arts category
application process is dehumanized and isolating
online only process favors bureaucratic expediency
lack of contact between applicants and decision-makers
solutions_proposed: Create a working group or task force made up of long time 'legacy' artists to create policy
Establish a 'legacy or established' arts category
